text: Jason Wentworth is a Republican member of the Michigan House of Representatives. Prior to his election to the House, Wentworth worked for the Michigan Veterans Affairs Agency and was a member of the United States Army.State Representative Jason Wentworth After graduating high school, Wentworth joined the United States Army. He spent five years as a military police officer and completed a tour in South Korea. Wentworth earned his bachelor's degree from St. Petersburg College in Florida and his master's degree in Leadership from Central Michigan University. Prior to being elected to the Michigan House, he was the East Central Michigan Regional Coordinator for the Michigan Veterans Affairs Agency. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Living people Category:Members of the Michigan House of Representatives Category:Michigan Republicans Category:St. Petersburg College alumni Category:Central Michigan University alumni Category:United States Army officers
title: Jason Wentworth
